Nicola Galombik bụ nwanyị South Africa na-azu ahịa nakwa nwanyị ọchụnta ego, nke a mara maka ịtọ ntọala Harambee Youth Employment Accelerator, South Africa,.otu anaghị akwụ ụgwọ na-enweta ihe nrite
Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke Yellowwoods, ụlọ ọrụ na-ejide ego na South Africa
Ọrụ ya gụnyere mmepe amụma maka gọọmentị Nelson Mandela na imepụta atụmatụ agụmakwụkwọ maka ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi South Africa
Nicola Galombik nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na fim, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị & Psychology site na Mahadum Witwatersrand  na 1988 tupu ya enweta Masters na Cinema na Media Studies na Mahadum New York na 1992
Nicola bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Yellowwoods Investments, ụlọ ọrụ na-ejide ego na South Africa
Tupu ịbanye Yellowwoods na 2010, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke Converse Consulting site na 2004 ruo 2009

Ọ bụ onye isi atụmatụ ihe onyonyo na South African Broadcasting Corporation site na 1996 ruo 2003 ebe o hiwere ngalaba mmụta ha,  na onye isi ọdịnaya mpaghara maka ndị isi mgbasa ozi nọọrọ onwe ya site na 1994 ruo 1996
Na mbụ, ọ tinyere aka na ọtụtụ òtù na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ma nyekwa aka n'ịzụlite amụma maka ọchịchị mbụ nke Nelson Mandela

Galombik hiwere Harambee Youth Employment Accelerator na 2010 iji lebara enweghị ọrụ ntorobịa dị elu na South Africa, nke “mmụba” nke ndị ntorobịa na-eru ogogo iru ọrụ  kpatara na iji dozie enweghị nkwekọ n'etiti ndị ọrụ na ndị e were n'ọrụ
Na Swahili "Harambee" pụtara "anyị niile jikọtara ọnụ"
Galombik na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche kemgbe mmalite nke nzukọ a
Ụlọ ọrụ ntinye ego nke Galombik a kpọrọ Yellowwoods, na mmekorita ya na ego ọrụ ego gọọmentị South Africa National Treasury's Fund webatara nzukọ a
Harambee na-ejikọ ndị na-achọ ọrụ oge mbụ na ndị mmekọ ọrụ site na netwọk ekwentị enwetara na-enyocha ma na-azụ ndị na-achọ ọrụ oge mbụ maka ọrụ mbụ ha
Site n'ịmepụta nnukwu netwọkụ nke ndị ọrụ na-adị mfe ịnyagharị na igosi na enwere ike idowe ntorobịa nke ọma site na iji usoro a, Harambee enweela ike ịbawanye mbọ na arụmọrụ ha
Harambee malitere na ebumnuche nke ijikọ ndị ntorobịa South Africa pụkụ iri na-enweghị ọrụ n'ọrụ ma ugbu a enyela pụkụ otu narị ndị na-achọ ọrụ oge mbụ ohere ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ narị ise
Ndị na-anaghị akwụ ụgwọ na ndị isi ya ejirila onyinye na ego sitere na otu dị ka Skoll Foundation  na USAID
Schwab Foundation nabatara Nicola na 2020 dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-emepụta ihe nke afọ
Enyere ya Skoll Award for Social Entrepreneurship na 2019
Ọ bụ onye ibe nke African Leadership Initiative na African Leadership Network, na IGD Frontier 100
Ọ bụkwa onye nrite nke John P
McNulty Prize Laureate n'afọ 2015 na onye otu Aspen Global Leadership Network
Ọ nwetakwara ohere ịgụ akwụkwọ n'efu site n'aka Fulbright ịga Mahadum New York
Nicola jere ozi dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ndị otu maka African Leadership Academy's Decennial Symposium on Enabling Social Enterprise,  ma kwuokwa na GIBS Business School
Pọdkastị Rockefeller Foundation #Solvable agbawokwa ya ajụjụ ọnụ
